alert.note: Alert for Bleckley; Dooly; Houston; Macon; Peach; Pulaski; Twiggs (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 6:58PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Macon, northwestern Pulaski, south central Twiggs, northeastern Dooly, southwestern Bleckley, southeastern Peach and Houston Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 658 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Meadowdale, or near Perry, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Perry, Fort Valley, Cochran, Hawkinsville, Warner Robins, Unadilla, Marshallville, Hayneville, Browndale, Meadowdale, Houston Lake, Mobley Crossing, Elko, Grove Park, Ocmulgee Public Fishing Area, Moss Oak, Paulk, Pulaski State Prison, Porter, and Miami Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Bleckley; Dooly; Houston; Macon; Peach; Pulaski; Twiggs
